sentences.en: "This really is a catchy rhythm, huh?" he added, with a few little hops.
sentences.cn: “这个节奏还真想让人跟着跳,是吧?”他说着又小步蹦跶了几下.

sentences.en: A solution appeared one night in a TV ad for a company with a catchy name.
sentences.cn: 他曾担心自己买不起新的电脑,不过办法后来突然出现了.

sentences.en: Draw the simple design around the baseboard with a catchy color contrast.
sentences.cn: 用醒目的颜色在踢脚板上画好简单的设计.

sentences.en: Give your show a catchy title.
sentences.cn: 给你的节目取个朗朗上口的名字.

sentences.en: It helps them memorize the months a catchy rhyme.
sentences.cn: 它以朗朗上口的韵脚来帮助他们记起月份.

sentences.en: It is short and pithy, catchy, thousands of years, a household name.
sentences.cn: 它短小精悍 、 琅琅上口, 千百年来, 家喻户晓.

sentences.en: It's a very nice song. Catchy, and inoffensive.
sentences.cn: 这是首挺不错的歌，朗朗上口又不难听。

sentences.en: Kelly: That's not true. A successful song needs to have a catchy chorus.
sentences.cn: 凯莉: 这不是真的. 一首成功的歌曲需要有琅琅上口的合唱.

sentences.en: Road Map to Riches Well, I like the catchy title.
sentences.cn: “致富线路图”?嗯, 我喜欢这个吸引人的标题.

sentences.en: She had a catchy little routine.
sentences.cn: 她有一小段情节生动的例行表演.

sentences.en: The chorus is very catchy to say the least.
The song's so catchy it makes you bounce round the living room or tap your feet.
sentences.cn: 这首歌很动听，听着它你就会不由自主地在客厅里舞动，或是用脚打拍子。

sentences.en: The songs were both catchy and original.
sentences.cn: 那些歌曲既上口，又富有原创性。

sentences.en: To have the catchy sound of a simple , repetitious rhyme or doggerel.
sentences.cn: 他曾经听过的一些一直在他脑海里浮现的无聊的打油诗.

sentences.en: Tony Stark : [ reading the newspaper ] Ironman? That's kinda catchy.
sentences.cn: 托尼斯塔克 ( 读报纸 ): 叫钢铁侠? 比较容易记吧.

trans.tran_cn: 易记的，易使人上当的，迷人的
trans.tran_en: a catchy tune or phrase is easy to remember
